title: Luxury River Frontage - Utilities Paid!!!
posting_body: Newly remodeled garden level of a magnificent home on the Clear Creek green belt.
Living area totals 1660 square feet, and includes private entrance; kitchen; fireplace; & washer/dryer.
New carpet and laminate flooring throughout.
Secluded yard has river frontage, bike path access, and spectacular mountain views, with plenty of room for plants/flowers and/or raised garden beds.
Super close to I-70, making it an easy drive to the mountains, or a quick 15-minute trip Downtown.
Close to Sprouts, Super Target, Costco, Home Depot and Olde Town Arvada.
This is a smoke-free property - absolutely no smoking, vaping, or drug use of any kind is allowed anywhere on the premises.
A single person or couple is preferred; other options will be considered.
Proof of income, good references, a background check, and a minimum credit score of 700 are required.
A security deposit of $3,000 and the first and last months' rent are due at the time of lease signing.
All utilities, including gas and electric, water, sewer, trash removal, and access to a cable internet (Comcast) Wi-Fi network are included for an additional $300/month contribution to expenses.
